entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
